ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry a Hybrid is not classified by any class that can use slashing weapons. Second Shaman s don t get any slashing weapons to my knowledge. Also Druid s
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry a Hybrid is not classified by any class that can use slashing
weapons. Second Shaman's don't get any slashing weapons to my knowledge.
Also Druid's get to use Scimitars only and that's from some Roleplaying
point of view or something like that.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Lange, Stephen <SLANGE@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, September 30, 1999 5:08 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: "Lange, Stephen" <SLANGE@...>
>
>>They are not hybrids, they are the priest classes.
>
>A hybrid is considered any class that can use slashing weapons or armor.
>Druids and Shaman can. Pure Casters cannot. Ask yourself, does the Druid
>or Shaman follow the same weapon/armor rules as a Pure Caster
(Mage/Wizard).
>Clerics are the oddball, in that they can wear armor.
>
>>
